name: Booze Helper
description:
Returns glass flasks when the purified water is used in the brewing process.

This used to fix audio bugs with women drinking, but that was fixed in the early 2021 patch so I have removed that bit of code.

[b]Mod ID:  1877326722[/b]

Source at [url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://github.com/Kharzette/ConanMods][img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jhass/github_desktop_notifications/master/res/icons/GitHub-Mark-Light-64px.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://www.patreon.com/bePatron?u=27670106][img]https://c5.patreon.com/external/logo/become_a_patron_button.png[/img][/url]
changeNote:
The big bugfix patch of a few days ago fixed lady sounds when drinking.  This allows me to blast several files and alot of dubious subclassing of the buff system.

Recipes are the only thing this mod does now (return glass flasks so they aren't lost).
author: Kharzette
